name: Provisions on the Administration of Deep Synthesis Internet Information Services
model_type: Deep synthesis and generative content services
use_case: Regulates deep synthesis technologies including synthetic audio, video, and virtual digital humans to prevent misuse.
data_summary: Requires clear labeling of synthetic content, data security measures, and user consent for biometric data usage.
compliance_materials: Security assessment and risk mitigation reports
monitoring: Requires providers to conduct content moderation, security assessments, and establish complaint handling mechanisms.
emergency_plan: Mandates rapid response plans for misuse, illegal content dissemination, and system vulnerabilities.
obligations: Label deep synthesis outputs and provide opt-out mechanisms.
File algorithms and conduct security assessments with CAC.
Prevent generation of prohibited content and handle user complaints promptly.
penalties: May incur warnings, rectification, service suspension, and fines under relevant laws.
